events.message: I recently received my order, but I want to request a refund because the product does not meet my expectations and I am not satisfied with it.
The reported issue has been identified as a refund request based on the customer's message indicating dissatisfaction and intent to get money back.
An agent from the customer service team has been assigned to handle the refund request for this case.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you'd like to request a refund for your recent order. Could you please provide the order number and reason for the return?
To process your refund request efficiently, please share your order details and specify the issues you've encountered with the product.
My order number is 123456. The product arrived on time but unfortunately it doesn't work as described and I would like to return it and get my money back.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate the refund process and email you a prepaid return shipping label within the next 24 hours to make the return easier.
Thank you for your quick response and support. I appreciate the return label being sent and look forward to receiving further instructions.
We have sent the return shipping label to your email and your refund will be processed once we receive the returned product.
Just following up to confirm if you have returned the product and if there is anything else we can assist you with regarding your refund.
Your refund has been fully processed, and the case is now closed. Please contact us anytime if you need further assistance.
